src:
他發明了iPhone 但不用社群媒體（視頻）

06 Nov 2019, 04:33

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月06日訊】史蒂夫·賈伯斯不用社群媒體！他沒有用Facebook、也不用Twitter。
時間點：收集點是什麼？ 0:37史蒂夫·賈伯斯在大學的生活1:43一定要先做研究 4:39第三方追蹤器 5:43注意自己開的玩笑7:04

text:
He invented the iPhone but didn't use social media (video)

06 Nov 2019, 04:33

[New Tang Dynasty Beijing time, November 06, 2019] Steve Jobs does not need social media! He doesn't use Facebook or Twitter.
Time point: What is the collection point? 0:37 Steve Jobs in college life 1:43 must do research first 4:39 third-party tracker 5:43 pay attention to their own jokes 7:04
